operation.name: loadAllSystemSelectableValues
operation.sql: SELECT TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.VALUEID, TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.VALUECONTENT, TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.VALUEDESC, TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.TDTID, TB_WSM_THEMES_PARAMS.PARAMSID, TB_WSM_THEMES_PARAMS.PARAMSTYPE, TB_WSM_THEMES_PARAMS.PARAMSCODE, TB_WSM_THEMES_PARAMS.PARAMSNAME FROM TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE RIGHT JOIN TB_WSM_THEMES_PARAMS ON TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.PARAMSID=TB_WSM_THEMES_PARAMS.PARAMSID WHERE TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.ISVALIDATE=1 AND TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.TDTID IN( SELECT TB_WSM_THEMES_DEFINE_TYPE.TDTID FROM TB_WSM_THEMES_DEFINE_TYPE WHERE TB_WSM_THEMES_DEFINE_TYPE.ISVALIDATE=1 AND TB_WSM_THEMES_DEFINE_TYPE.THEMESID IN( SELECT TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES.THEMESID FROM TB_WSM_SYS_THEMES GROUP BY THEMESID ) ) ORDER BY TB_WSM_THEMES_SELECTABLE_VALUE.TDTID
